description:
《英文天天写》是沪江部落一档写作类节目，其目的在于提升大家的英语写作能力。每期节目主持人都会给出一个话题，积极参加的童鞋还会得到主持人的专业点评哦！想提高英语写作的童鞋千万不要错过哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

话题：

1,如果老人晕倒在地，你还会不会去扶？
2,媒体为什么要传递正能量，真善美？
3,如果媒体不得已伪造事件来传递正能量，你怎么看？
 

范例1：

Of course, I will give my hands to the elderly person falling on the road. To be honest, I believe most old people (more than 99.999%) do not have a wicked heart. When they are in the situation that really needs others’ help but I’m just standing by, I would consider that I’m not a true man. Years ago, I crashed down an old granny when I was riding a bicycle. After that, I took her to the nearest hospital for scan the bone. Once she found that the bone was OK just some bruises on the skin, she sighed a long relief and thanked me a lot that I hadn’t ran away. On the process of body check, she was always talking that her son was a policeman and she didn’t want to disturb his work. However, after knowing she was not wounded, she told me that what she’d said about her son was totally a lie. She just wanted to intimidate me not to run away! But in the end, she really appreciates my honest behaviour.
On the other hand, if I’m unlucky to be entrapped by a vicious person, I’m not afraid to face him in any occasions, even in the court. I would like to follow LI XX’s mother to challenge the wicked charge on me, but I believe that I can win in the end!
 
范例2：
As we are in the era of information explosion, the mass media uncover some corrupt officials, which is to the gratification to the people. Something nasty is, however, also broadcasting via the media, like what happened last week. A prestigious old may forget who pushed her and doubt the boy who raised her. The press, aiming to increase their circulations, vigorously propagates the event, which has exerted a profound negative influence that nobody is willing to raise the old. Some painful repercussion, for instance the census it is not the old are worse but the bad are aging, is expanding. Hence, to promote social harmony, the main stream media should take the responsibility to spread the positive energy.
 
范例3：
Personally speaking, without any doubt my answer is "yes" to the first question above. Like an ancient Chinese idiom says, we can't "give up eating for fear of choking". Maybe it is a little overstated, but in the spiritual level, the virtue of helping others to the social morality is what eating to our subsistence, both are essential and urgent.
The society's self-purification capability is not strong enough, that why we need the media regulation to promote "the true, the good and the beautiful", which are universal values to guide our lives. The media should not only focus on those positive news or even made up one showing us in what a beautiful world we live in, nor should they partially report those negative news to draw public attention, gaining their own fame. 
In my opinion, the media had better to stick to its tenets: report the truth and be objective. However, unfortunately, we all share such a fact that news organizations in our country are a little utilitarian at present. So back to the first question, I would try to leave some evidence to prove my innocence if I helped an elderly fall, whenever possible.

title: 英文天天写： 世界不是只有黑色——打击负能量！！！

description:
The battle to prevent healthy scepticism from metastasising into cancerous solipsism has typified Western philosophy since Thales of Miletus theorised that all things were but cosmic spindrift conjured momentarily from a great and watery flux. But although such naturalistic explanations have a long and distinguished pedigree, very few of us have ever managed to act on their basis. I wager that even the greatest living atheist, Richard Dawkins, doesn't survey his breakfast table each morning and feel that all's right with the Rice Krispies because they've been brought into being by the highly complex interaction of insensate and ultimately purposeless processes.

No, surely his conviction that nothing stands outside the observable is a form of professional closure. As a scientist, he doesn't want anyone butting into his laboratory - and he has, like all ambitious people, extended the realm of his endeavours to encompass… well, to encompass everything. Certainly the dead can have no place in Dawkins's world - but having purged them on the basis they can furnish no proof of their existence, do we not begin to undermine the capacity of that which they have left behind to also speak to us?

title: 直面死亡（有声）

description:
The Colombian writer Gabriel Garcia Marquez has died. He was 87. Garcia Marquez was best known for his 1967 novel 100 Years of Solitude which sold more than 20 million copies and was translated in over 30 languages. Garcia Marquez was awarded the Nobel Prize for Literature in 1982. Candice Piet looks at the life of the man who gave readers all over the world their first adventure into Latin America.

Gabriel Garcia Marquez was born in the ramshackle banana town of Aracataca on the Caribbean coast. It was the background and inspiration for much of his work. He was raised by his grandmother and aunts, people full of folk beliefs.

It was like living in the Roman Empire governed by omens and portents, by changes in the weather and in the atmosphere, by dreams and changes in humour. We were managed by visible gods. They were very Catholic people, but they had on the one hand their Catholic God and on the other the whole world of superstition and that really dominated the house.

Gabriel Garcia Marquez trained as a journalist and travelled the world as a foreign correspondent, but his childhood experience remained central and his stories wove fact and history with the fantastic and improbable. At 40, he brought out the book that would change everything.

description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

歌手介绍：

麥莉·希拉（英语：Miley Ray Cyrus，本名：Destiny Hope Cyrus，1992年11月23日－），美国著名女演员及创作歌手，乡村音乐歌手比利·雷·赛勒斯的女儿。影歌视三栖的全方位艺人，被封为新一代小天后、流行乐主及青少年偶像。 11岁时参加《孟漢娜·蒙塔娜》电视系列剧的角色征选孟漢娜·蒙塔娜的好朋友Lily Truscott，意外被导演看中饰演主角孟漢娜·蒙塔娜。

Butterfly Fly Away

模唱片段：

You tuck me in, turn out the light 你给我把被子盖好，关上灯
kept me safe and sound at night 让我夜里能安心地酣睡
Little girls depend on things like that 小女孩们依赖这样的事儿
Brushed my teeth and combed my hair 刷牙，梳理头发
Had to drive me everywhere 开车带我去各个地方
You were always there when I looked back当我回望时，你总在那儿
You had to do it all alone 你总要一个人做这些事
Make a living, make a home 赚钱，养家
Must have been as hard as it could be 无论多艰苦
And when I couldn't sleep at night当我夜里不能入睡时
Scared things wouldn't turn out right 害怕的东西袭来时
You would hold my hand and sing to me 你会握住我的手，轻声哼唱

title: BBC模仿秀: 金融业借金钱挽回声誉

description:
《英闻天天译》是一档沪江部落的原创翻译互动节目（戳去参与节目>>>），主持人提供翻译参考文本，对大家递交的翻译作品进行点评，和大家共同进步！本期节目选取的是关于敢家暴，还要不要愉快的踢球了的一则英文报道，让我们一起在翻译中关注。

SUMMARY：
图为圣何塞警察局提供的一张日期未标的照片，此人正是旧金山49人队防守端锋雷麦唐纳。
 
CONTENT：
The San Francisco 49ers defensive end Ray McDonald has been arrested, jailed and bailed on domestic violence charges, California police said on Sunday.
The Sacramento Bee reported that police were called to a birthday party being held for McDonald, who turns 30 onTuesday. The newspaper and NBC Bay Area, which first reported the news, also reported a policesource as saying that the alleged victim, McDonald's fiancée, was 10 weeks pregnant.
If McDonald is found guilty, that could lead to a tougher penalty than the new six-game ban for a first offence that was announced by NFL commissioner Roger Goodell on Thursday.
 
KEYWORDS:  
SanFrancisco 49ers 旧金山49人队 （旧金山淘金者队（San Francisco 49ers）也可翻译成49人队。淘金者队于1946年作为全美橄榄球联合会的一员参加比赛，并于1950年加入由美国橄榄球联合会合并而成的NFL。）
defensiveend 防守端锋 （防守端锋 (Defensive End, DE)列队于防守截锋外侧，左右各1名。防守端锋主要的任务是冲球，使对方四分卫没有足够的时间来做出准确的抛传，防守端锋的冲刺速度要很快。防守端锋和防守截锋通常合称为防守前锋(defensive linemen)，人数多半是3至4名）
RayMcDonald 雷麦唐纳
bail保释
domesticviolence 家暴
charge指控
The SacramentoBee 《萨克拉门托蜜蜂报》 （萨克拉门托蜜蜂报是加利福尼亚州撒拉门托的宜家报纸）
NBCBay Area美国全国广播公司（海湾地区）
policesource 警方消息人士
fiancée未婚妻
allegedvictim 受害人
six-gameban 六场禁赛
firstoffence 初犯
NFLcommissioner 美国橄榄球联盟委员
RogerGoodell 罗杰.古德尔
 
key sentence
If McDonald is found guilty, that couldlead to a tougher penalty than the new six-game ban for a first offence thatwas announced by NFL commissioner Roger Goodell on Thursday.
 
这一句理解起来应该无甚障碍，但是请大家注意一下语序的调整。若按照原句语序做译，则又会出现生硬的中文长句子。观察下句子层次，可以按照时间的顺序组织。此句中很显然是周四RogerGoodell 先公布对其的量刑，而后再出现条件句。所以可以将主句中Roger的话给提到句首，再译条件句主干。即周四，罗杰···，倘若···
 
REFERENCE：
http://www.theguardian.com/sport/2014/aug/31/san-francisco-49ers-ray-mcdonald-jailed-domestic-violence-charges
 
【沪江英语小编】大家在查看主持人提供的翻译版本前，可以先自己进行尝试翻译练习，只有在不断的翻译中翻译能力才能有所提升哦！

轻松注册沪江，马上参与【英闻天天译】节目练翻译→

本期节目参考译文：（参考译文由该节目主持人提供，仅供参考，欢迎大家讨论）

参考译文1：

周日，加利福尼亚警方称，旧金山49人队内防守端锋雷麦唐纳被控家暴，现已走过拘捕，入狱，保释等一系列程序。
据《萨克拉门托蜜蜂报》报道，警方是在雷麦唐纳生日宴上接到报警的，而周二，雷便满30周岁。该报同美国全国广播公司（海湾地区）均在第一时间内就将此消息公之于众，此外二机构还披露警方消息人士方面讯息，该消息人称受害人乃是雷麦唐奈的未婚妻，已怀有10周身孕。
周四，美国橄榄联盟委员球员罗杰.古德尔念其初犯，仅将刑罚增至6场禁赛。不过倘若雷最终被判有罪的话，那么他将接受更为严苛的惩戒。

参考译文2：
美国加州警方周日称，旧金山49人队防守队员雷·麦克唐纳德因受到家庭暴力的指控被逮捕拘留。
《萨克拉门托蜜蜂报》报道称，当天警方接到报警赶到现场，周二将满30岁的麦克唐纳德正在开生日聚会。同时，该报及首先报道该消息的NBC还报道说，根据警方透露，受害人，麦克唐纳德的未婚妻，已有10周身孕。
周四国家橄榄球联盟（NFL）行政管理员罗杰·古德尔宣布，首次犯罪的队员将受到禁赛六场的惩罚。但如果被判有罪，麦克唐纳德面临的惩罚将比禁赛六场更为严厉。

title: 聚焦美国预算期限(1/2)

description:
本节目为沪江部落一档美语发音模仿节目，每期节目选取30秒左右的慢速VOA新闻内容，主持人亲自朗读示范模仿发音，对发音要点进行讲解，并配以详细的语音语调示意图，手把手教你练就地道美音范儿！想要得到主持人专业的点评和意见吗？去沪江部落订阅本节目！

今日主持人： 岩见泽
30秒音频：

主持人模仿音频：

模仿文本：Some colors that people see late at night could cause signs of the condition mental health experts call clinical depression. That was the finding of a study that builds on earlier study findings. They show that individuals who live or work in low levels of light overnight can develop clinical depression.

译文：有的人在深夜看到一些颜色会影响到自己心理健康状况，专家称这种症状为临床抑郁症。这是一项建立在曾经的发现基础之上的结论。报告显示，那些夜晚在昏暗的环境中工作或生活的人，会患上这种临床抑郁症。

重点单词发音讲解：

cause \ˈkȯz\
condition\kən-ˈdi-shən\
clinical \ˈkli-ni-kəl\
depression \di-ˈpre-shən, dē-\
expert \ˈek-ˌspərt, ik-ˈ\
individual \ˌin-də-ˈvij-wəl, -ˈvi-jə-wəl, -ˈvi-jəl, -ˈvi-jü-əl\
of \əv, before consonants also ə; ˈəv,ˈäv\
off \ˈȯf\
